Title: Veiled Trouble
Description:
I was hoping that we would find a way to dispel these strange arcane memories from what remains of Malygos and Sindragosa.

It appears they've grown more out of control than I expected. 

Please, accompany some of the gathered blue dragons to the Veiled Ossuary and help Azuregos.

Sindragosa and I will remain here, and investigate what to do about this situation.
ObjectivesText: Investigate the arcane disturbances within the Veiled Ossuary.
